name: King-Sized Sausage
description:
King-Sized Sausage

King-Sized Sausage is an original and challenging cooking game. Just cook a sausage in the shortest time possible and try not to drop it! This sausage is too long for being cooked easily, can you? 

Controls: 

Mouse - Rotate pan 
Left click - Cook 
Right click x2 - Go to the Menu

Credits:

Game design, 3d models, art and beta testing done by Emparans

Music and programing done by JCF765

Programing, graphic style and unity management done by Exploding_Bits 

Sound effects obtained from https://www.zapsplat.com

A game created using unity
